title: Construction Indonesia 2025 Expands Focus on Building Materials and Technology
body: Construction Indonesia 2025, marking its 25th anniversary, will be held alongside the Concrete Show South East Asia in Jakarta, emphasizing sustainable and smart building solutions, with a significant participation of over 449 companies and 10,200 visitors from 30 countries. The event aims to strengthen industry collaboration and explore cutting-edge technology, as Indonesia's construction sector continues to grow, projected to maintain a stable economic growth rate of 4.9% amid global uncertainties.
